title: sbom: syft reports "unable to open image source" - possibly due to wrong args / starting directory
body:
### What happened?

Running `goreleaser release --skip-publish --clean` getting an error out of syft generating SBOM:

```
  ⨯ release failed after 4s                  error=cataloging artifacts: syft failed: exit status 1: 1 error occurred:
        * failed to construct source from user input "dist/gr-minimal-repro_Windows_i386.zip": unable to load image: unable to determine image source
```

My expectation was a successful build and completion of SBOM

----

I was able to get some hints after a good bit of debugging, or at least I think I was.  Using this `dlv` debug script I was able to get the args and env variables being passed to `syft`:

```
transcript dlv.out
break C:/Users/DuaneWaddle/go/src/github.com/goreleaser/goreleaser/internal/pipe/sbom/sbom.go:207
continue
print cmd
continue
exit
```

If I run `syft` manually with (basically) the same arguments it works:

```
PS C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\go\src\github.com\UVDuane\gr-minimal-repro> syft .\dist\gr-minimal-repro_Windows_i386.zip --file sbom.sbom --output spdx-json
 ✔ Indexed file system               C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\AppData\Local\Temp\syft-archive-contents-1710168046   ✔ Cataloged file digests
 ✔ Indexed file system               C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\AppData\Local\Temp\syft-archive-contents-1710168046   ✔ Cataloged file metadata
 ✔ Indexed file system               C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\AppData\Local\Temp\syft-archive-contents-1710168046
 ✔ Cataloged packages              [0 packages]
A newer version of syft is available for download: 0.90.0 (installed version is 0.89.0)
PS C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\go\src\github.com\UVDuane\gr-minimal-repro>
```

But from HERE I (eventually) noticed in the `dlv` output that the `Cmd` being created has a starting directory (`Dir`) of `dist`.  Sure enough, if I run the same `syft` command from inside the `dist` dir, it fails just like under goreleaser.

```
PS C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\go\src\github.com\UVDuane\gr-minimal-repro> cd dist
PS C:\Users\DuaneWaddle\go\src\github.com\UVDuane\gr-minimal-repro\dist> syft .\dist\gr-minimal-repro_Windows_i386.zip --file sbom.sbom --output spdx-json
A newer version of syft is available for download: 0.90.0 (installed version is 0.89.0)
1 error occurred:
        * failed to construct source from user input ".\\dist\\gr-minimal-repro_Windows_i386.zip": unable to load image: unable to determine image source
```

----

After all of this, my assumption is that the path to the artifact when calling `syft` should not include `dist/`. but I am using the most basic defaults for the `sboms` config.


### How can we reproduce this?

Minimal reproduction in https://github.com/UVduane/gr-minimal-repro
